reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Innovating services, eliminating risks, rebuilding lives in El Salvador

description.narrative: El Salvador - HIV - Ministry of Health of the Republic of El Salvador - MOH. This program has the following goals: Reduce new HIV infections in key populations in El Salvador. The objectives of this program are: Contribute to the prevention of HIV in key populations through the provision of comprehensive services. Strengthen and expand comprehensive services for people with HIV/AIDS, with emphasis on the key population, in the different institutions that provide health services.. Strengthen the healthcare system in its resilience and sustainability, through a human rights, gender and multisectoral participation approach.
